input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product specification information.

Product specification:
DG Performance 04-4103 - RCM Steel Exhaust (Black) for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 (1983-1986 )

Product features:
RCM - Great performance and phenominal value!
The midpipe diameter and gets larger as it gets to the muffler body to help scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power
Better throttle response and a smoother power delivery
RCM stands for Reverse Cone Megaphone.
Steel construction

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This DG Performance Steel Exhaust is the perfect addition to your Yamaha Tri-Moto 225. The exhaust system is made of high-quality steel and is designed to last. The midpipe diameter is larger than the stock unit, which helps to increase power and provides a smoother power delivery. The exhaust is also equipped with a reverse cone megaphone, which gives it a unique and aggressive sound. The installation is easy and can be done without any welding. It comes with a one-year warranty and is made in the USA.
input_text.Response B: DG Performance RCM Steel Exhaust (Black) for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 (1983-1986) is made of steel construction.  The midpipe diameter and gets larger as it gets to the muffler body to help scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power.  Better throttle response and a smoother power delivery.  The RCM stands for Reverse Cone Megaphone.  Great performance and phenominal value!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
